endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all advertising campaigns, including their identifiers and metadata.
Get detailed information about a specific advertising campaign specified by its ID.
Create a new advertising campaign by specifying required parameters and content.
Update an existing advertising campaign's details using the campaign's ID.
Remove an advertised campaign using its unique identifier.
Fetch performance metrics for campaigns over a given period and segmentations.
List available advertisement inventory items and their current statuses.
Submit click data associated with advertisements for analysis and recording.
Retrieve anonymized aggregated user interaction data with ads.
Update advertisement platform privacy configurations and consent settings.
